content.html: Confirmed that Sourcegraph let go 8% of staff: 24 folks on Tuesday. No engineers were let go, but 5 directors were laid off and non-tech teams impacted. The curious part of this is how Sourcegraph has yet to touch its $125M raised in 2021. Tells a lot about market predictions.
content.value:
Confirmed that Sourcegraph let go 8% of staff: 24 folks on Tuesday. No engineers were let go, but 5 directors were laid off and non-tech teams impacted.

The curious part of this is how Sourcegraph has yet to touch its $125M raised in 2021. Tells a lot about market predictions.
